dcterms:creator: N. Sharma
R. Mandal
R. Sharma
U. Pal
M. Blumenstein
dcterms:description: The CVSI-2015 dataset contains scene text images of ten different scripts: English, Hindi, Bengali, Oriya, Gujrati, Punjabi, Kannada, Tamil, Telegu, and Arabic. Each script has at least 1,000 text images collected from different sources (i.e. news, sports etc.). The dataset has three sets â€“ training set (60%), validation set (10%) and test set (30%).
dcterms:title: CVSI-2015

dcterms:creator: B. Shi
X. Bai
C. Yao
dcterms:description: The SIW-13 dataset consists of 16,291 multi-scripts text images in 13 classes: Arabic, Cambodian, Chinese, English, Greek, Hebrew, Japanese, Kannada, Korean, Mongolian, Russian, Thai, and Tibetan. The images are collected from Google street view. The texts appearing in the images are in different orientation, fonts, colour and size, making the dataset challenging for script identification.
dcterms:title: SIW-13

dcterms:creator: N. Nayef
F. Yin
I. Bizid
H. Choi
Y. Feng
D. Karatzas
Z. Luo
U. Pal
C. Rigaud
J. Chazalon
W. Khlif
dcterms:description: The ICDAR-2017 dataset has 68,613 cut out word images for training and 16,255 word images for validation. It consists of 9 languages: Arabic, English, French, Chinese, German, Korean, Japanese, Italian, Bangla. The dataset is challenging due to complex backgrounds and stylish fonts.
dcterms:title: ICDAR-2017

dcterms:creator: L. Gomez
A. Nicolaou
D. Karatzas
dcterms:description: The MLe2e dataset is considered a Multi-Language end-to-end dataset for the evolution of scene text images starting from text region detection to script identification and text recognition tasks. It contains 1178 and 643 word images for training and testing respectively of four different scripts: Latin, Chinese, Kannada, and Hangul.
dcterms:title: MLe2e
